text: "Kiss the Bride" is a 1983 song by Elton John and is the third single from his 17th studio album Too Low for Zero. It was a top 40 smash hit in many countries except in Germany where it peaked at number 58. In 2021, it was used in the Elton John and Dua Lipa single Cold Heart. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Kiss the Bride (song)
